description: Have you ever gone into work and really, really not felt like doing anything? Or found that during an intense period, creativity in every other area of your life conveniently increases and procrastination becomes productive? It doesn't have to be that way. Presenting Mood Driven Development: set yourself free. Work on whatever the frack you feel like.

title: Mood Driven Development
